education.field_of_study: Computer Science and Engineering with Specialization in Internet of Things (IoT) and Intelligent Systems (Hons)

projects.name: LAPTOP PRICE PREDICTOR
projects.description: Built a Machine Learning model that predicts the price of a laptop based on given specifications. Used libraries such as NumPy, Pandas, Matplotlib, Scikit-Learn, Seaborn.

projects.name: WEB APPLICATION TEXTUTILS
projects.description: Built a web application using React and Bootstrap. The application contains functionalities to apply specific modifications to input text.

projects.name: UI AUTOMATION PROJECT
projects.description: Built an automation project to retrieve product data from the Amazon website, filtering it based on specifications, and displaying it in an excel file.

projects.name: CONWAYS GAME OF LIFE
projects.description: Implemented Conways Game of Life in Python using Pygame.

projects.name: MOTION DETECTION SYSTEM
projects.description: Built a motion detection system using arduino uno, IR sensor and LED.

experiences.description: Worked as a Robotic Process Automation (RPA) intern. Learnt to use the Uipath tool. Automated manual tasks using Uipath. Built automation projects such as UI automation, excel automation, etc.
